title: Building In NZXT's New BEAFY BOY Case
description: My AMD test system needs a new home.  Affiliate links to some products seen in the video: -Pink Asus Nezuko-Chan Case:      -Glass NZXT H9 Elite Case:  -DeepCool LT720 AIO:  -Corsair Dom Plats DDR5 Memory:  -Gigabyte X670 AORUS Elite Motherboard :   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Help us buy weird computers and tech to make videos on by 'Joining' the channel on YouTube here:  Or you can support the channel on Patreon:   *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
